hero.heading: University of Windsor
hero.description: A student-run organization that aims to provide a community for Computer Science students.

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.subheading: TL;DR - We're a group of Computer Science students who love to learn, code, and have fun!

cards.heading: Learn
cards.description: Join a passionate community of learners dedicated to exploring the world of technology beyond the classroom.

cards.heading: Code
cards.description: Enhance your programming skills through coding workshops, hackathons, and challenges.

cards.heading: Connect
cards.description: Expand your network by connecting with students, professors, and tech professionals.

cards.heading: Enjoy
cards.description: Balance work and play with our diverse range of fun events, from game nights to movie nights.

events.upcomingEventsSubheading: Check out our upcoming events and join us!
events.recentEventsSubheading: We currently don't have any upcoming events. Check out our past events while we plan new ones for you!

newsletters.subheadingSubheading: Discover the latest insights and updates in our newsletters.
